params.data: represent the data specific Kyc data field that requestor requesting
shows the requested Kyc data field that is requested by data Requestor
params.dataProvider: who represent the address of data Provider who fill the KYC data

params.kycField: This represent the specific field of KYC form such as name, dob and so forth

returns._0: bool true if it signed by correct signer or false

approveCondition(address,address,string).notice: approveCondition is just a getter function to receieve whether it is approved or not
